summary: CHRYSLER 300M 2002, 13000 MILES  FRONT STRUT BOLTS AND WASHERS CORRODED. TWO WASHERS FRACTURED AND BOLTS WITHOUT SUPPORT. OTHER TWO WASHERS SHOW SIGNS OF CORROSION. FAILURE OF OTHER 2 BOLT WASHERS  COULD HAVE RESULTED IN STEERING PROBLEMS WITH THE CAR, POTENTIALLY RESULTING IN ACCIDENT. CAR IS ONLY 1 YEAR OLD.  CORROSION IS PROBALY CAUSED BY INCOMPATIBLE METAL SELECTION OF WASHER AND BOLT, AND/OR TOO HIGH STRENGHT STEEL FOR WASHER AS IT FRACTURED IN ABOUT 15 BITS. OTHER WASHER SPLIT IN TWO.
